meanings.definition: A private viewing or preview of an art exhibition.
meanings.sent1: I was excited to attend the vernissages of the new art exhibition.
meanings.sent2: The vernissages of the art exhibition allowed us to see the paintings before the public.
meanings.sent3: At the vernissages, we felt like art detectives uncovering hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The vernissages were like secret gatherings where art whispered its stories.
meanings.sent5: The vernissages painted a picture of elegance and exclusivity.

meanings.definition: The opening ceremony of an art exhibition.
meanings.sent1: The vernissages marked the beginning of the art exhibition with flair.
meanings.sent2: Attendees eagerly awaited the vernissages to kick off the art show.
meanings.sent3: During the vernissages, the artists danced around their masterpieces.
meanings.sent4: The vernissages were a grand spectacle, like a theatrical performance.
meanings.sent5: The vernissages set the stage for a captivating art experience.
